name: Pussy Puzzle (itch)
description:
Yes, you can do puzzles! - AmberFrmThVault Gaming 

TL;DR: A jigsaw puzzle game with hand drawn cat pictures 🎨🖌️🖼️🐈🧩📦💝(Sorry (not sorry) for the clickbait)

Gameplay

Is there anything better than a good, relaxing puzzle game?
Of course: A good, relaxing puzzle game with pussies in it!
And what would make it EVEN better? If those high detailed pussy master”pieces” were hand drawn by JujiBla!
Pick a pussy puzzle you like and solve it in one of the 3 different puzzle sizes. Once all 3 of them have been solved you will unlock the “bigger than FULL-HD” wallpaper.

Features
  • 23+ “pussys with character” to puzzle
  • 3 different puzzle sizes
  • 24 beautiful wallpapers to unlock
  • Larger than Full-HD WQXGA wallpapers (2560x1600) for desktop and mobile
  • Puzzle piece rotation (optional)
  • Chill music
  • Hint system
  • Different backgrounds to your liking
  • Steam achievements
LET'S PLAY
